description: Start your day right with our hearty breakfast options. Served all day!

items.name: Classic Breakfast
items.description: Two eggs cooked to order, choice of bacon or sausage, hash browns, and toast

items.name: Country Breakfast Platter
items.description: Two eggs any style, crispy bacon, country sausage, golden hash browns, biscuit with gravy, and toast

items.name: Buttermilk Pancakes
items.description: Three fluffy pancakes served with butter and warm maple syrup

items.name: Cinnamon French Toast
items.description: Three slices of thick-cut bread dipped in our special cinnamon egg batter, griddled golden brown

items.name: Western Omelet
items.description: Three-egg omelet with ham, peppers, onions, and cheddar cheese. Served with hash browns and toast

items.name: Garden Veggie Omelet
items.description: Three-egg omelet with mushrooms, tomatoes, peppers, onions, and Swiss cheese. Served with hash browns and toast

items.name: Biscuits & Gravy
items.description: Two homemade buttermilk biscuits smothered in our signature sausage gravy

items.name: Breakfast Sandwich
items.description: Fried egg, American cheese, and choice of bacon or sausage on a toasted English muffin

items.name: Old-Fashioned Oatmeal
items.description: Hearty oatmeal served with brown sugar, raisins, and milk
